attributes.action: Change the trespass law from a civil offence to a criminal one.
attributes.additional_details:
Other than in very limited circumstances, trespass is a civil rather than a criminal offence. 
This needs to change to protect the rights of people and their property.
attributes.background: I am a landowner and there have been over 80 cases of trespassing and damage to property, by activists, trying to stop the badger cull, on private farmland in my area.
